author: thorsten
msg: Working version from odt to xdocs plugin. I did use a couple of different stylesheets rather then writing a odt-to-xdocs stylesheet.

author: dreid
msg: The James project was using 'nightly' as a date and also listing a nightly
build as a release, which I think is wrong. However, thanks to their
"creative" use of the fields the rss feed was broken. This commit will get the
file parsable again. Code needs to be added to limit the number of entries
to a sensible number, last 20 would be my suggestion.
